      • disconnect

        public static void disconnect(javax.smartcardio.Card card,
                              boolean reset)
                       throws javax.smartcardio.CardException
        Calls Card.disconnect(boolean) with the fixed reset parameter. The parameter is fixed based on the used provider and assumes that written code is correct.
        Parameters:
        card - The card on what to act
        reset - The intended operation after disconnect
        Throws:
        javax.smartcardio.CardException
